text:
@senatemajldr @LindseyGrahamSC OR this douchebag could be spending OUR time and OUR money focused on a global pandemic that's just getting worse. 

They don't care about the US.

If this isn't a reason to vote anti-@GOP all the way down the ballot I don't know what is.

Confirmed Covid-19 cases: 1,537,830
